data.title: Best Actor & Director Awards
data.meta_description: IMDb Qualifying Best Actor & Director Awards - New York (Best Actor Award & Best Director Award) is a Competition celebrating Actors and Directors
data.meta_site_name: Best Actor & Director Awards - New York
data.text:
Best Actor Award®

Special Jury Award: Outstanding Performance, Best Actor in a Comedy, Best Actress in a Comedy, Best Actor in a Dark Comedy, Best Actress in a Dark Comedy, Best Actor in an Adventure Film, Best Actress in an Adventure Film, Best Actor in an Action Film, Best Actress in an Action Film, Best Actor in a Thriller, Best Actress in a Thriller, Best Actor in a Mystery Film, Best Actress in a Mystery Film, Best Actor in a Fantasy, Best Actress in a Fantasy, Best Actor in a Sci-Fi, Best Actress in a Sci-Fi, Best Actor in a Horror, Best Actress in a Horror, Best Actor in a Drama, Best Actress in a Drama, Best Actor in a Historical Film, Best Actress in a Historical Film, Best Actor in a War Film, Best Actress in a War Film, Best Actor in a Noir Film, Best Actress in a Noir Film, Best Actor in a Detective Film, Best Actress in a Detective Film, Best Actor in a Western, Best Actress in a Western, Best Actor in a Romance, Best Actress in a Romance, Best Actor in a Musical, Best Actress in a Musical, Best Actor in a Fan Film, Best Actress in a Fan Film, Best Actor in a Parody, Best Actress in a Parody, Best Actor in an LGBTQ Film, Best Actress in an LGBTQ Film, Best Actor in a Biographical Film, Best Actress in a Biographical Film, Best Actor in an Inspirational Film, Best Actress in an Inspirational Film, Best Actor in a Social Justice Film, Best Actress in a Social Justice Film, Best Actor in a Sport Film, Best Actress in a Sport Film, Best Actor in a Web-Series, Best Actress in a Web-Series, Best Actor in a Silent Film, Best Actress in a Silent Film, Best Actor in an Experimental Film, Best Actress in an Experimental Film, Best Supporting Actor, Best Supporting Actress, Best Child Actor (from 5 to 12 y.o.), Best Child Actress (from 5 to 12 y.o.), Best Young Actor (from 12 to 18 y.o.), Best Young Actress (from 12 to 18 y.o.), Best Acting Debut, Best Voice Over Performance, Best Ensemble, Best Duo, Best Monologue.

Best Director Award®

Special Jury Award: Outstanding Performance, Best Director of a Comedy, Best Director of a Dark Comedy, Best Director of an Adventure Film, Best Director of an Action Film, Best Director of a Thriller, Best Director of a Mystery Film, Best Director of a Fantasy, Best Director of a Sci-Fi, Best Director of a Horror, Best Director of a Drama, Best Director of a Historical Film, Best Director of a War Film, Best Director of a Noir Film, Best Director of a Detective Film, Best Director of a Western, Best Director of a Romance, Best Director of a Musical, Best Director of a Fan Film, Best Director of a Parody, Best Director of an LGBTQ Film, Best Director of a Biographical Film, Best Director of a Nature Film, Best Director of an Ethnographic Film, Best Director of an Inspirational Film, Best Director of a Social Justice Film, Best Director of a Sport Film, Best Director of a Documentary, Best Director of a Web-Series, Best Director of an Animation, Best Director of a Music Video, Best Director of a Silent Film, Best Director of an Experimental Film, Best Director of an AI Film, Best Director of a Commercial, Best Director of a Drone Video, Best Student Director, Best 1st time Director of a Feature, Best 1st time Director of a Short.

What we’re looking for: Feature Films, Short Films, TV/Web-Series, Indie Films, Student Films, Music Videos, Commercials, Animations, Experimental Films, Documentaries. We accept films of any length, genre and language. Non-English films must have English subtitles.

We do not accept: 1. Amateur videos. 2. Extremist or propaganda content from religious or political organizations. 3. Pornography. 4. Films with a poor production standard (bad sound, lack of subtitles/captions for non-English films, video resolution lower than 720p HD). 5. We don’t accept scripts. 6. We don’t accept excerpts/scenes from films: you must submit the entire film.

BEFORE SUBMITTING YOUR PROJECT PLEASE READ ALL RULES AND REGULATIONS.

By submitting your film, take note that:

The Best Actor & Director Awards – New York is hereby granted the rights to utilize an excerpt (trailer/teaser/poster/stills) from any film submitted for promotional purposes. The films will not be available online. Multiple entries are allowed for each filmmaker and each entry may be submitted to multiple categories. The winning categories vary every month depending on the submissions we receive and on the performances. If we think the categories submitted are not to a standard of the Best Actor & Director Awards – New York win, they will be removed. If you submit your film to the category ‘Best Acting Debut’, it must be your first or second time acting in a film (any kind of film); If you submit your film to the category ‘Best 1st time Director of a Short’, it must be your first or second time directing a short film; If you submit your film to the category ‘Best 1st time Director of a Feature’, it must be your first or second time directing a feature film: otherwise, your film will be disqualified from that specific category. Trophies are optional, are not included in the submission fee and all Winners may order the trophy by paying production costs and shipping costs. The Competition reserves the right to refuse entries and the Jury can remove the movie from the competition at any time. Entry fees are non-refundable. The individual or corporation submitting the film hereby warrants that it is authorized to commit the film for possible screening (private and/or public) and understands and accepts these requirements, rules and regulations. Only the Best Films of a whole year will be selected by the Jury for the Annual Screening Event. You agree to indemnify and hold harmless the Best Actor & Director Awards – New York, from and against any and all claims, liabilities, losses, damages, and expenses (including but not limited to attorney’s fees, and costs of the court) which may be incurred by reason of any claim involving copyright, trademark, credits, publicity, screening, and loss or damage of the screening videos entered.

By submitting your film, you acknowledge you have read, understood and accepted all rules and regulations.

What we’re looking for: Feature Films, Short Films, TV/Web-Series, Indie Films, Student Films, Music Videos, Commercials, Animations, Experimental Films, Documentaries. We accept films in any length, genre and language. Non-English films must have English subtitles.

We do not accept: 1. Amateur videos. 2. Extremist or propaganda content from religious or political organizations. 3. Films involving politics / films promoting political agenda. 4. Pornography. 5. Films with a poor production standard (bad sound, lack of subtitles/captions for non-English films, video resolution less than 720p HD). 6. We don’t accept scripts.

By submitting your film, take note that: The Best Actor Award is hereby granted the rights to utilize an excerpt (trailer/teaser/poster/stills) from any film submitted for promotional purposes. The films will not be available online. Multiple entries are allowed for each filmmaker and each entry may be submitted to multiple categories. Winning categories vary every month depending on the submissions we receive. If we think the categories submitted are not to a standard of the Best Actor Award win, they will be removed. The Competition reserves the right to refuse entries and the Jury can remove the movie from the competition at any time. Entry fees are non-refundable.

The individual or corporation submitting the film hereby warrants that it is authorized to commit the film for possible screening (private and/or public) and understands and accepts these requirements, rules and regulations. Submitting to the award competition includes the membership to the cultural organization Oniros Films which organizes the event Best Actor Award. You agree to indemnify and hold harmless the Best Actor Award, from and against any and all claims, liabilities, losses, damages, and expenses (including but not limited to attorney’s fees, and costs of the court) which may be incurred by reason of any claim involving copyright, trademark, credits, publicity, screening, and loss or damage of the screening videos entered.
